Instead, he teaches how the interplay of anatomy, biomechanics and footwear can lead to happy or hurting feet. Include anecdotes, tips and tried-and-true methods from runners, ultra runners, hikers, adventure racers and foot-care specialists. Describes hundreds of foot-care products for nearly every possible foot ailment imaginable, from Achilles tendonitis to toenail fungus. New chapters on.
short_description: The updated edtion of Fixing Your Feet: Injury Prevention and Treatments for Athletes helps you learn the basics and finer points of foot care.
